评论详情: I like the length of this top, which goes below the hips. It's cute too. The cut and style takes the focus off of one's midsection. The fabric is lightweight, appears to be likely to hold its shape, and lays well without emphasizing bulges. True to my normal size.
The fit is perfect. Not too tight and not too loose. I love the brightness for my late afternoon to evening runs/brisk walks. The material breaths and flows nicely with my movements.

Fits well. The fabric is a little less soft than other moisture wicking clothing I own, but not to the point of being uncomfortable. I haven't tested it in the dryer, but no problems in the washing machine, and air drys very quickly.

This is a REALLY nice shirt. I've worn it in the pool with shorts and to casual restaurants. It's crazy comfortable and slimming with the lines.  I've washed it dozens of times (never put it in the dryer,  tho) and it looks brand new.  I love it.
The shirts came as described and shown. Fit was a bit snug, but not too much.
Ordered "recommended" size.  Mistake.  Order up.  This is very clingy.  Every bulge, bump or imperfection shows.  Would not wear in public.  Color was nice and it was well made.
This is a great shirt for sports. It doesn't stick to you after exercise. It flows freely.
Great exercise top. Nice material and perfect fit
Fits great. Very comfortable. I like wearing it, when working out.
This top is a beautiful color and the pattern is very flattering.

I was pleasantly surprised at how this top looked on me. I am 5' 8" tall and weigh 145 lbs. Most of the exercise tops in the stores now are geared for younger women(in my opinion) because the length barely goes to the waist. I wanted something a little longer than that so that I could wear it to physical therapy or to exercise in and this top gives much better coverage...approximately to the middle of my hips. A size large was selected but I think I might have been able to wear a medium. I used my sewing machine to take the sides in because it was a little too wide, making it look somewhat sloppy. I had to take the hem apart a little to do that. It was a lot of extra work but I am very happy now with how it looks on me.
I think if I bought this in a larger size, it might not show My fat rolls in my back. Showed every flaw.
I love the color and fit. It’s a cute casual top to run errands in
True to size.  I love the style and the length and fit.  I have this in five colors. The fabric is light and dries fast.

I needed atop to exercise in but a little nicer than cotton tee shirt. This is perfect! And it is nice and long to cover tummy and bottom. Fabric is soft and stretchy. I bought and returned the orange shade because it was pretty bright but ordered another in navy. In the fall I plan to order the long sleeve version.
Like the fit of this shirt, very comfortable.

评论概述: Very comfy and just the right length
评论详情: Very comfy and just the right length! Great value for the money!
Had to return. I’m 5’5” and 199 pounds and 3x was too tight

I have this shirt in purple, but wanted another color, so I ordered the orange one.  I wear them to bed because they help keep me cooler at night.  I've discovered that the purple one keeps me cooler and fits me better than the orange though.  The orange one seems to be a bit smaller/tighter across the chest.  It's not as comfortable to sleep in because it is tighter.  Both shirts are the exact same size and style.  It's very odd that they don't fit and wear the same.
This is a perfect shirt for working out.  The length falls below the hips.  Air drying is recommended because the fabric can melt in the dryer.  The color stays vibrant after several washes.
Nice style and material. I’m only 5’ so it’s longer on me than expected. For now I’m doing a half tuck and other tricks to shorten it up, but may eventually hem it shorter.
Used it to wear to physical therapy but it’s so comfortable I wear it as part of my casual dress.

It fits, but the neckline hangs loose and the shoulders creep foward. The underarms don't lay down right, so as I exercise, the shirt bulges just above my breasts. It hugs my stomach, clinging to all the unflattering parts of my body. This top wasn't designed to make plus size women look good.
COMFORTABLE! Soft feel material, good sweat catcher but looks good on the way to the gym. I’m buying a second one in a different color.
I really like the color. Fits great. Washes fine but I hang to dry I would order another in a different color.
I am very happy with this workout top that I use for my Pilates Reformer classes. I can move very well in it and it is fashionable at the same time. I highly recommend it.
Like light weight fabric. Style is attractive. I intend purchase more for traveling
Even the XL (my usual size) was tight around my middle. This one’s going back
It truly fits perfectly. Stays dry when ver hot outside. Easy to wash, dries quickly Color is vibrant Love it
I really love this top.  It is figure flattering and goes with any workout bottom.  Order a size up as it runs small
I got these for my Pilates class, great fit and lightweight. Will buy a couple more
The fabric is stretchy and lightweight. I purchased it for yoga and it didn’t fit my body.
I like the comfort and style

I own about six of these Miss Fortune brand shirts in both short and long sleeve.  They are very attractive and I think flattering.  They have this moisture wicking fabric that makes them cooler in the summer.  They are so comfortable.  I just wish they made more colors. They run true to size.
I thought this would be more tunic length, but shorter  than I expected.

评论概述: looking for a top that is versatile
评论详情: Fits well and is a great color.
The size is perfect, especially for us senior ladies. Generous cut and a flared, long bottom make it a perfect top!
This top works great for working out.  It was long enough to make my yoga pants look decent and it doesn’t wrinkle!
Very comfortable and washes great.  Needed the top for physical therapy.

评论概述: Just what I was looking for.

I HAVE SEERAL OF THESE IN LONG SLEEVES!! I LOVE FOR WORKING OUT OR JUST AS A SHIRT!! SUPER COMFORTABLE & WASHES WELL!! THINKING OF PURCHSING A FEW MORE!
Yes I do like it.. fit is perfect
Great pickleball  shirt  it is soft and comfy.
Love the longer length.
This is a very comfortable top.  I bought it a size up, just because I wanted it to fit loose for exercise.

The color of this top is just what I wanted. Matches a pair of pants I have to a T.  The fit of this top is perfect. Other tops I’ve bought at three times the cost don’t fit near as well.  I’ve tried it on but haven’t worn it yet, so time will tell how it holds up.
It runs a little big, I usually wear a large in a casual shirt but probably should have gotten a medium. The material is fine and it washes well.
Fits well. Looks nice. Wearing for yoga, also a nice extra layer under a hoodie.
The top looks good, is comfortable for work outs, and fits nicely.
I really like the way this fits, especially in the hips… it has a flare to it and allows movement with ease.
Wears well and cleans easily
Good plus size shirt for the gym!  Comfortable, stretchy.  Longer style that covers up top.
Very nice top but sizes do run small. I recommend going 2 sizes up. I ordered 1 size larger than normal and it is snug.

I love the material, the cute design. The material is slick so it doesn't stick to you, is thick enough not to be see thru, and the color is slightly multicolored, not solid, which hides things. The only problem I had, is it is fitted and I need more straight. So if you do not like form fitted, order next size up.

评论概述: Nice and served my Yoga purpose
评论详情: The material was of quality as expected. I should have ordered the next smaller size as it was a little big on me. This was my fault as I was between sizing and went with the larger size. I wore it to yoga class and it was fine. So it still serves my purpose bought for. I would recommend it to others. The shipping was received well within expectations

I am 5'9 and 163 lb. I wouldn't describe this top as too large. It fit me great in the bustline. It was just kind of full and swishy around my hips. I LOVE the blue color and the navy stitching. I gave it 4 stars for the fullness around my hips but did not send it back. Hope this helps.

评论概述: Fit is large and I don’t like huggy stuff at my age my body doesn’t need it.
评论详情: Fabric is very soft and appears well made. With this fabric I order up a size and I should not have. It’s very roomy.
This is a great little casual shirt. True to size, nice fabric. Doesn't feel or look "cheap" like some things I've ordered. Wish I'd ordered one in several colors!
Very comfortable and light weight shirt. I bought several of these for working out and for running.
The shirt is too snug to wear with leggings.  Wanted it to float around hips and butt, but it is snug.
Did not have the flair as in the pictures
I was looking for something a little longer and not skin tight. This works well and I like the purple color

I like how lightweight this is. Will be great for exercising. However it ran small for me. I'm losing weight though so should soon fit in it. I have wide hips and that was my problem. Otherwise it is a cute top.
I like the shirt but the material snags very easily.  You have to be gentle with it.
Took way too long to deliver

I usually wear a large and was thinking this one was a loose fit compared to a straight cut shirt.  It fit closer than I thought it would by how it looks in the photo but maybe that's just my body type.  I'll keep it because it's soft and will be easy to pack.

I purchased this shirt as a light-weight base layer for warmer days on a backpacking trip in South America.  It was perfect!  Light pack weight, comfortable, flattering, and great wicking properties.  Fast drying and doesn’t get smelly.  I purchased the light turquoise color and it is very pretty.  Fit was perfect.  I will most likely be buying a few more for everyday workouts, although they are cute enough to wear with leggings to run errands and such as well.
Product washes up well and is good quality for the price. I would purchase again.

Flattering, but suggested size is a bit too small.
Just starting pt and I needed some comfortable tops. This one has good coverage and is very comfortable
Absolutely love this top.
True to size, and very comfortable.  Love the color

I really like this top for my exercise classes.  It is light weight and fits well except the sleeves are a bit long for me but that's because I have short arms.  It is comfortable and looks very nice as well.  I'm very glad that I purchased it.

评论概述: Thin Material but fits me nicely
评论详情: I buy large mainly because of my hips and not my chest.  This tops fits me nicely so it may not fit chestier women. The sleeves are not overly long which is a nice change.  The main problem I have with this top is the thinness of the material.
Very nice and comfortable.  Color does not look like picture.  Not nearly as bright. More of a muted color.  I would have given it 5 stars if the color looked more like the picture.
I wear it again and again for the gym. Let’s me breathe
this runs a little small

This is the 5th shirt I have purchased. I have various colors and sleeve lengths.  The shirt has a great flow to it. Doesn't wrinkle.  Shirt alone can be casual.  Adding a scarf  and black sweater makes it "dressier".  Very easy to travel with.  Can rinse it out in hotel sink and hang to dry for next day wearing.  I have 2 short sleeve and 3 long sleeve versions.
I use at my weight and strength class and it’s loose but not too loose and it’s cool

Well made and worth the money. The fabric has a great soft silky feel. A large is probably long for most except the tallest person. I did not check the lengths before I purchased. If you like your behind covered this is the top for you!
It is cute but clings too much for workouts. I bought a larger size hoping it would help. I expected more of a tee shirt fit and feel. However the quality is good. I may wear it as a regular top
Beautiful muted color. Comfortable fit. Good value.
Great for workout clothes.  Washes well.

It was cute for the first wear. Then it caught on something and the front stitching snagged. I tried to fix it but it was no use. Unfortunately I didn’t wear it immediately so I’m now out of my return window. So don’t waist your money if you brush against things with your chest it will ruin your shirt.
Fit is loose and size I expected was correct.  I like the fabric and it should be perfect for my walking trip.  Cool and sink washable.

Looks good and fits comfortably

I am reviewing this item as great although I didn't like the fit. That has nothing to do with the item, that is my preference. If I had a nicer figure, it would have looked awesome. I will order in the future when I am fit.
Too small

I bought it for my exercise class. I bought a large when I usually wear a medium because I wanted it loose. It runs very small. I used it, but it was not comfortable. If you buy it, buy at least one if not two sizes too big. I did really like the fabric, and I am trying to stretch it.
Very comfortable. I thought the lines were see through, but you can't really tell. Love this shirt!
The fabric is very nice and the fit of the top is very flattering. Love the material which hangs very  complimentary. I am very pleased with the "Miss Fortune" line so far.

Fits great - comfy
Love the  colors and the way both shirts fits.
It's a cute color and hangs nice. I'm afraid if it shrinks it will be to tight.

Beautiful !

This purple long sleeve exercise shirt fits great and feels really good!  I didn't expect it to be this nice, due to the inexpensive price.  It moves well, for all positions, and has a nice flow about it.  Does not wrinkle.  I love it!
